body.name: Avengers Marvel Black Panther 6"-Scale Marvel Super Hero Action Figure Toy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 15 mins
features: 6-Inch scale black Panther figure – Imagine T'Challa sprinting into battle as the clawed Super hero with this 6-inch-scale black Panther figure, inspired by the Avengers movies.
Movie-based, character-inspired accessory – this Marvel action figure includes a black panther-inspired spear accessory that makes a great addition to any Marvel figure and vehicle collection.
Marvel movie-inspired design – fans can imagine action-packed scenes with this black Panther figure, inspired by Avengers movies from the Marvel Cinematic universe.
Articulation and detailing – Marvel fans can imagine the Avengers entertainment excitement with this poseable black Panther figure, featuring articulated arms and head and movie-inspired deco.

Collect a Marvel universe – look for other Marvel toys and figures (each sold separately, subject to availability) to build a Marvel universe, inspired by the Marvel Comics, movies, and entertainment.
body.description: Imagine the incredible, super-powered action of the Avengers with figures, role-play, and more Inspired by the Avengers movies! These figures are inspired by the Avengers movies, part of the Marvel Cinematic universe that includes Avengers: Infinity war. Avengers: Infinity war features characters like iron Man, Captain America, Spider-Man, black Panther, and more! With Avengers toys, kids can imagine battling like their favorite heroes and playing their part in saving the galaxy! Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability. T'challa, the King of Wanda, protects his homeland and the world From threats. This black Panther figure includes a black panther-inspired spear accessory for movie-inspired battling action! Collect Avengers 6-inch-scale figures to assemble a team of Marvel Super Heroes and imagine action-packed scenes from the Marvel universe. (Figures each sold separately. Subject to availability. ) copyright 2018 Marvel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 11 year old gives thumbs up
reviews.reviewText: From our 11 year old: This is a very good action figure. It looks realistic and not cheap. The knees and elbows bend very well. The weapon is fun to play with when he is fighting other guys. I bought this with my own money so I was very glad it wasn't very expensive. Some of them are very expensive. This looks very realistic but not for a lot of money so I think it is five stars. My little brother also says it is a very cool figure.

reviews.reviewText: My son has played with it and think it's the perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Toy box was opened
reviews.reviewText: Product was what is was, but the box was halfway open. Wasnt sure if opened while packaging, or someone tried to remove an item from the box.Nephew loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cool and Exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: Seller shipped the item very quickly and without any issues. The action figure looked exactly as pictured and looks and feels that it’s made with quality; especially for the price. My 7 year old absolutely loved this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy and cheap plastic
reviews.reviewText: As mentioned on my previous review, I still have the 90's X-Men/Marvel action figures and the build of this is nowhere close. This is made out of cheap plastic and it feels like the joints will break apart when my son actually plays with them. It is not even good enough to be a decoration because the paint job is not decent. It is matte but very rough on the edges. I would not recommend this as a toy at all. For a desk decoration maybe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Black Panther: The Amputee Version
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toy for an eight-year-old boy who absolutely loves the Black Panther. We played with the figure for an hour when the Panther's right leg popped off. Like, it just popped. Off. No worries, I said, we can just pop it back on, right? Not right. Like some weirdness that defied all of the laws of physics, the leg simply refused to attach. I had to make up something fast to avert a major meltdown and preserve my reputation. This was Black Panther Amputee. A special version to teach kids about living without one of their limbs. Very rare. Did my young friend believe me? No. But he appreciated my effort, and black Panther Amputee resides in his special superhero box, sans leg.
Súper recomendado, la entrega muy rápido, los productos tan cual l foto y a un precio accesible
